thread.title: Transport Minister to open renovated Wakefield Kirkgate station
thread.title_full: Transport Minister to open renovated Wakefield Kirkgate station | Calendar - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Transport Minister to open renovated Wakefield Kirkgate station
text:
Wakefield's renovated Kirkgate station will be officially opened by the Transport Minister today.
Andrew Jones will open the station, which originally opened in 1840 following a £5.6 million facelift. It is hoped the renovated station will bring in an extra £38 million into the region's economy.
Last updated Mon 14 Sep 2015 Travel Wakefield West Yorkshire
